template.data:
{{Object.fromEntries(
  Object.entries(
  {'Asset Name': (filterAsset.value == null || filterAsset.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterAsset.value),
  "Owner": (filterOwner.value == null || filterOwner.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterOwner.displayValue),
  "World Region": (filterRegion.value == null || filterRegion.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterRegion.value),
'Country': (filterCountry.value == null || filterCountry.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterCountry.displayValue),
'Status': (filterStatus.value == null || filterStatus.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterStatus.displayValue),
'Start Date after': (filterAssetStartDate.value == null || filterAssetStartDate.formattedString == '' ? 'n/a': filterAssetStartDate.formattedString),
'End Date before': (filterAssetEndDate.value == null || filterAssetEndDate.formattedString == '' ? 'n/a': filterAssetEndDate.formattedString),
'Online within': (filterAssetOnlineQuarter.value == null || filterAssetOnlineQuarter.formattedString == '' ? 'n/a': filterAssetOnlineQuarter.formattedString),
'Offline within': (filterAssetOfflineQuarter.value == null || filterAssetOfflineQuarter.formattedString == '' ? 'n/a': filterAssetOfflineQuarter.formattedString),

'Detail Type': (filterDetailType.value == null || filterDetailType.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterDetailType.displayValue),
'Detail Status': (filterADStatus.value == null || filterADStatus.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterADStatus.displayValue),
'Detail Start Date': (filterADStartDate.value == null || filterADStartDate.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterADStartDate.formattedString),
   'Detail End Date': (filterADEndDate.value == null || filterADEndDate.value == '' ? 'n/a': filterADEndDate.formattedString),
   
   'Ongoing outages only': (filterOutageCurrent.value == false ? 'n/a' : '✔️ ' + radioOutageType.value),
   'Months since last outage': (filterOutageLast.value == null || filterOutageLast.value == '' ? 'n/a' : `${radioOutageType.value}: ` + filterOutageLast.value)
}
  ).filter(([key,value])=> value != 'n/a' )
)
}}
